name: Malone Media Group
tagline: Redefining the Role of Advertising Agencies
description:
Malone Media Group was founded on August 24th, 2010 and is wholly owned by the Agency Principals: Amanda & Jeff Malone. Our clients partnered with Malone Media Group because they needed a new type of advertising agency that would provide proactive service coupled with transparent, results-oriented solutions capable of delivering more effective & cost-efficient advertising campaigns.  
Over the last 8+ years, Malone Media Group has experienced organic growth solely based on results-driven referrals across a multitude of verticals including:  Tier 3 Dealerships, Tier 3 Dealer Groups, Tier 2 Acura DAA’s, Land Developers, Home Builders, Retail, Financial and Master Franchise Systems. 
Malone Media Group is Houston-based and currently represents 149 clients, coast to coast, from California to Florida, with $60 Million+ in buying power across 35 metro markets. A fully integrated, Google Premier agency, that employs 94 grinders to create success for you by leveraging our economies of scale.
Malone Media Group provides all agency services, turn-key and in-house, because we know that quality is the foundation to long term partnerships.
